column4: is their a way i can make terminal launch by pressing a button combination?!
any one? is it possible to launch terminal with a button comp? LIKE CTRL+DLT
i launch terminal with the Menu-button.
the terminal is much better than xterm...
yeah what should i do? i want to open it by pressing like CTRL+ALT+T
i needed to know cus you have to do something else then. do this Menu -> system -> settings -> keyboard shortcuts
scroll down until you fint start a terminal or something...
press it, then press your shortcut
